metadata.title: Unveiling the Origin and Transmission of 2019-nCoV
metadata.author: Yifei Xu

introduction: A novel coronavirus has caused thousands of human infections in China since December 2019, raising a global public health concern. Recent studies (Huang et al, Chan et al, and Zhou et al.) have provided timely insights into its origin and ability to spread among humans, informing infection prevention and control practices.

summary: A novel coronavirus has caused thousands of human infections in China since December 2019, raising a global public health concern.
Unveiling the Origin and Transmission of 2019-nCoV
Recent studies (Huang et al, Chan et al, and Zhou et al.) have provided timely insights into its origin and ability to spread among humans, informing infection prevention and control practices.
